patterns.name: linear_topology
patterns.description: Linear Topology: Implements sequential reasoning, where each agent builds upon the output of the previous one. This topology is well-suited for multi-step reasoning tasks.

patterns.name: star_topology
patterns.description: Star Topology: Supports parallel hypothesis generation and evaluation, embodying a divide-and-conquer approach ideal for decomposable or multi-perspective problems.

patterns.name: feedback_topology
patterns.description: Feedback Topology: Enables iterative refinement through generate-and-critique cycles. This is particularly effective for tasks requiring self-correction or quality enhancement.

patterns.name: planner_driven_topology
patterns.description: Planner-Driven Topology: Incorporates a central planner agent to dynamically coordinate other agents, offering maximum flexibility. It is especially useful for open-ended or unstructured tasks with no predefined solution path.
